mapper.insert: insert into ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST (ID_, REV_, NAME_, PARENT_ID_, CASE_DEF_ID_, BUSINESS_KEY_, STATE_, START_TIME_, END_TIME_, START_USER_ID_, CALLBACK_ID_, CALLBACK_TYPE_, TENANT_ID_) values ( #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseDefinitionId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessKey ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startUserId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callbackId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callbackType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST (ID_, REV_, NAME_, PARENT_ID_, CASE_DEF_ID_, BUSINESS_KEY_, STATE_, START_TIME_, END_TIME_, START_USER_ID_, CALLBACK_ID_, CALLBACK_TYPE_, TENANT_ID_) values
( #{historicCaseInstance.id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{historicCaseInstance.name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.parentId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.caseDefinitionId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.businessKey ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.startTime ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{historicCaseInstance.endTime ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{historicCaseInstance.startUserId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.callbackId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.callbackType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.tenantId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT ALL
into ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST (ID_, REV_, NAME_, PARENT_ID_, CASE_DEF_ID_, BUSINESS_KEY_, STATE_, START_TIME_, END_TIME_, START_USER_ID_, CALLBACK_ID_, CALLBACK_TYPE_, TENANT_ID_) VALUES ( #{historicCaseInstance.id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{historicCaseInstance.name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.parentId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.caseDefinitionId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.businessKey ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.state ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.startTime ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{historicCaseInstance.endTime ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{historicCaseInstance.startUserId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.callbackId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.callbackType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicCaseInstance.tenantId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.update:
update ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST
REV_ = #{revisionNext, jdbcType=INTEGER},
NAME_ = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID_ = #{parentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_DEF_ID_ = #{caseDefinitionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_KEY_ = #{businessKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE_ = #{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME_ = #{startTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME_ = #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
START_USER_ID_ = #{startUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALLBACK_ID_ = #{callbackId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALLBACK_TYPE_ = #{callbackType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID_ = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST where ID_ = #{id} and REV_ = #{revision}

sql.if: select distinct RES.*, VAR.ID_ as VAR_ID_, VAR.NAME_ as VAR_NAME_, VAR.VAR_TYPE_ as VAR_TYPE_, VAR.REV_ as VAR_REV_, VAR.PROC_INST_ID_ as VAR_PROC_INST_ID_, VAR.EXECUTION_ID_ as VAR_EXECUTION_ID_, VAR.TASK_ID_ as VAR_TASK_ID_, VAR.SCOPE_ID_ as VAR_SCOPE_ID_, VAR.SUB_SCOPE_ID_ as VAR_SUB_SCOPE_ID_, VAR.SCOPE_TYPE_ as VAR_SCOPE_TYPE_, VAR.BYTEARRAY_ID_ as VAR_BYTEARRAY_ID_, VAR.DOUBLE_ as VAR_DOUBLE_, VAR.TEXT_ as VAR_TEXT_, VAR.TEXT2_ as VAR_TEXT2_, VAR.LAST_UPDATED_TIME_ as VAR_LAST_UPDATED_TIME_, VAR.LONG_ as VAR_LONG_ ${limitBetween}

select distinct TEMPRES_ID_ as ID_, TEMPRES_REV_ as REV_, TEMPRES_PARENT_ID_ as PARENT_ID_, TEMPRES_CASE_DEF_ID_ as CASE_DEF_ID_, TEMPRES_BUSINESS_KEY_ as BUSINESS_KEY_, TEMPRES_NAME_ as NAME_, TEMPRES_STATE_ as STATE_, TEMPRES_START_TIME_ as START_TIME_, TEMPRES_END_TIME_ as END_TIME_, TEMPRES_START_USER_ID_ as START_USER_ID_, TEMPRES_CALLBACK_ID_ as CALLBACK_ID_, TEMPRES_CALLBACK_TYPE_ as CALLBACK_TYPE_, TEMPRES_TENANT_ID_ as TENANT_ID_, TEMPVAR_ID_ as VAR_ID_, TEMPVAR_NAME_ as VAR_NAME_, TEMPVAR_TYPE_ as VAR_TYPE_, TEMPVAR_REV_ as VAR_REV_, TEMPVAR_PROC_INST_ID_ as VAR_PROC_INST_ID_, TEMPVAR_EXECUTION_ID_ as VAR_EXECUTION_ID_, TEMPVAR_TASK_ID_ as VAR_TASK_ID_, TEMPVAR_SCOPE_ID_ as VAR_SCOPE_ID_, TEMPVAR_SUB_SCOPE_ID_ as VAR_SUB_SCOPE_ID_, TEMPVAR_SCOPE_TYPE_ as VAR_SCOPE_TYPE_, TEMPVAR_BYTEARRAY_ID_ as VAR_BYTEARRAY_ID_, TEMPVAR_DOUBLE_ as VAR_DOUBLE_, TEMPVAR_TEXT_ as VAR_TEXT_, TEMPVAR_TEXT2_ as VAR_TEXT2_, TEMPVAR_LAST_UPDATED_TIME_ as VAR_LAST_UPDATED_TIME_, TEMPVAR_LONG_ as VAR_LONG_ ${limitOuterJoinBetween} RES.ID_ as TEMPRES_ID_, RES.REV_ as TEMPRES_REV_, RES.PARENT_ID_ as TEMPRES_PARENT_ID_, RES.CASE_DEF_ID_ as TEMPRES_CASE_DEF_ID_, RES.BUSINESS_KEY_ as TEMPRES_BUSINESS_KEY_, RES.NAME_ as TEMPRES_NAME_, RES.STATE_ as TEMPRES_STATE_, RES.START_TIME_ as TEMPRES_START_TIME_, RES.END_TIME_ as TEMPRES_END_TIME_, RES.START_USER_ID_ as TEMPRES_START_USER_ID_, RES.CALLBACK_ID_ as TEMPRES_CALLBACK_ID_, RES.CALLBACK_TYPE_ as TEMPRES_CALLBACK_TYPE_, RES.TENANT_ID_ as TEMPRES_TENANT_ID_, VAR.ID_ as TEMPVAR_ID_, VAR.NAME_ as TEMPVAR_NAME_, VAR.VAR_TYPE_ as TEMPVAR_TYPE_, VAR.REV_ as TEMPVAR_REV_, VAR.PROC_INST_ID_ as TEMPVAR_PROC_INST_ID_, VAR.EXECUTION_ID_ as TEMPVAR_EXECUTION_ID_, VAR.TASK_ID_ as TEMPVAR_TASK_ID_, VAR.SCOPE_ID_ as TEMPVAR_SCOPE_ID_, VAR.SUB_SCOPE_ID_ as TEMPVAR_SUB_SCOPE_ID_, VAR.SCOPE_TYPE_ as TEMPVAR_SCOPE_TYPE_, VAR.BYTEARRAY_ID_ as TEMPVAR_BYTEARRAY_ID_, VAR.DOUBLE_ as TEMPVAR_DOUBLE_, VAR.TEXT_ as TEMPVAR_TEXT_, VAR.TEXT2_ as TEMPVAR_TEXT2_, VAR.LAST_UPDATED_TIME_ as TEMPVAR_LAST_UPDATED_TIME_, VAR.LONG_ as TEMPVAR_LONG_

mapper.sql:
from ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST RES
left outer join ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST VAR ON VAR.PROC_INST_ID_ is null and VAR.TASK_ID_ is null and RES.ID_ = VAR.SCOPE_ID_ and VAR.SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn' and VAR.SUB_SCOPE_ID_ is null

from ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_HI_CASE_INST RES
inner join ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_CASEDEF CASE_DEF on RES.CASE_DEF_ID_ = CASE_DEF.ID_

foreach.if: inner join ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST A${index} on RES.ID_ = A${index}.SCOPE_ID_ and A${index}.SUB_SCOPE_ID_ is null and A${index}.SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn'

if.test: orQueryObject.caseDefinitionKey != null || (orQueryObject.caseDefinitionKeys != null && orQueryObject.caseDefinitionKeys.size() > 0) || orQueryObject.caseDefinitionCategory != null || orQueryObject.caseDefinitionName != null || orQueryObject.caseDefinitionVersion != null

foreach.if: inner join ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_CASEDEF CASE_DEF_OR${orIndex} on RES.CASE_DEF_ID_ = CASE_DEF_OR${orIndex}.ID_
left outer join ${prefix}ACT_CMMN_CASEDEF DEPLOY_CASE_OR${orIndex} ON RES.CASE_DEF_ID_ = DEPLOY_CASE_OR${orIndex}.ID_

where.if: and EXISTS(select ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_IDENTITYLINK I where I.SCOPE_ID_ = RES.ID_ and I.SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn' and I.USER_ID_ = #{involvedUser})

choose.when: and EXISTS (select ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST where NAME_ = #{queryVariableValue.name} and RES.ID_ = SCOPE_ID_ and SUB_SCOPE_ID_ is null and SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn')
and NOT EXISTS (select ID_ from ${prefix}ACT_HI_VARINST where NAME_ = #{queryVariableValue.name} and RES.ID_ = SCOPE_ID_ and SUB_SCOPE_ID_ is null and SCOPE_TYPE_ = 'cmmn')

if.test: queryVariableValue.textValue != null && queryVariableValue.longValue == null && queryVariableValue.doubleValue == null
queryVariableValue.textValue == null && queryVariableValue.textValue2 == null && queryVariableValue.longValue == null && queryVariableValue.doubleValue == null

choose.when: and (A${index}.TEXT_ is not null or A${index}.TEXT2_ is not null or A${index}.LONG_ is not null or A${index}.DOUBLE_ is not null or A${index}.BYTEARRAY_ID_ is not null)
choose.otherwise: and A${index}.TEXT_ is null and A${index}.TEXT2_ is null and A${index}.LONG_ is null and A${index}.DOUBLE_ is null and A${index}.BYTEARRAY_ID_ is null
